title: Drawing, "Screen Design:  "Temple of Nuclear Waste," Reverse Side", ca. 1985
medium: Black and gold marking pens, white crayon, brush and white gouache on tracing paper
description: Three panel screen on wheels in form of black, abstract buildings with gold pediments/domes and black and gold-patterned bases.  Left-most building with gold dome, central building with gold skyscraper pediment; right building with gold, fan-shaped pediment.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Screen Design:  "Temple of Nuclear Waste," Reverse Side", ca. 1985.
ca. 1985. Black and gold marking pens, white crayon, brush and white gouache on tracing paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-109.
